reviewText: Wendy Stevens doesn't just teach--she gives specific information that rocket fuels any marketer.  Whether you're brand new or a seasoned veteran, she will take you to your next level.  Most importantly, Reverse Google Marketing is empowering.  Wendy pulls the marketing genius out of you, so that you come away knowing "I can do this.  Wow, I AM doing it."  Thank you Wendy for helping take my 6 figure income to 7 figures in the next 12 months.

Wow!  I'm so excited to finally have an easy to follow program that allows me to get out there and get into action with marketing my business!  A true coach, through and through, Wendy has taken material that in the past has left my head swimming and made it so easy to understand and follow.  She has brought so much new information to this program, as well, which I really appreciate.  It's so great to have an "in" on cutting edge marketing.  I've been able to take this information and use it in my business to get real results.  My income is now reflecting a true plan of action.  Thanks so much, Wendy!

Wendy Stevens is a GENIUS.  The steps are simple, and begin with defining your target audience and then shows you, step by step, how to get them to find YOU.  Every internet marketers' MUST HAVE if they want huge results!  Thank you Wendy!!!

If you've been boggled by Google and addled by Adwords, you'll revel in Reverse Google Marketing. Renowned internet marketer Wendy Stevens will set you straight with her simple step by step approach to making money on the internet. Bravo!

Congratulations, Wendy!
You really simplify how to market on Google Content. Thank you for explaining everything in a way that is so easy to understand.

Anna and Luis Nio

First I'll start by saying that I not only own this 2 DVD set, But I had the distinct privilege of being invited to, and attending an intense two day training seminar in Ft. Lauderdale Florida run by Wendy Stevens herself. Aside from her personal strength, perseverance and warmth, she and the people she worked with to develop this marketing program are nothing short of geniuses'.

This program is so POWERFUL and concise. Yet it's laid out in a simple step by step method that ANYONE can do easily and get HUGE results fast!! Hey, I'm a just a humble carpenter and through the use of Reverse Google Marketing, my impression exposure is growing by leaps and bounds everyday now. It's such a simple approach and yet it simply can't be beat for its effectiveness. Knowing what Reverse Google Marketing has done for me, I'd gladly pay 5 times the cost. A small price since I personally know I`ll get it back tenfold very quickly.

If you're looking for a top notch program to produce massive traffic to your site? Look no further because YOU JUST FOUND IT!!!!

THANK YOU SO MUCH WENDY STEVENS!!!!

Chris & Wanda
This was fabulous!!  Very Powerful!!  This can be used for any business.  Really cutting edge material that will explode your business.  Thank You Wendy!!!  David Palmer

I really liked this easy to follow video.  I was scared of doing internet marketing (except for free internet classifieds) using pay per clicks because I heard so many horror stories about people paying $5.00 per click in some cases!  This shows you exactly how to do it for a fraction of the cost.  Now I have so many more leads now that I can effectively use the internet to market my business!

Wendy Stevens guides you step by step in creative, easy to understand steps on how Google can work for you, therefore increasing your income! Thank you Wendy!
Jill and Alex

After watching this program I am no longer afraid of Google. The mystery is gone. Wendy explains and shows you step by step how to explode your internet marketing using the biggest and baddest search engine in the world. Not too shabby! This is a must-have for anyone who is really serious about their business and internet marketing, and worth every penny. Don't Google without it. Thanks, Wendy

Jerry Scaglione
New Jersey

Wendy Stevens is a masterful communicator. With her clear step-by-step presentation she turns a subject that can be daunting to many into a marketing tool you can use in your business right away. This is THE internet marketing tool to own.

For anyone wishing to own a comprehensive tutorial on a cost effective, unique marketing system on Google, this product is a must. Wendy Stevens takes you through every aspect step by step, leaving the user in no doubt that they can utilize this system successfully. Everything that you need to know is there. It is clear, concise and complete.

Internet Marketing can be intimidating especially for people new to the industry.  Wendy takes the anxiety away with a simple, step-by-step approach to a very innovative system using the power of Google advertising.  Very powerful information - thank you so much!

I've used other marketing systems before, but none were as effective as Wendy's. Her "reverse" approach is unique and easy to follow, plus she gives lots of details on what NOT to do. This is stuff that the top Internet marketers use, but would never tell you about it - they want to stay on top! Wendy discloses her secrets so you can be a top marketer, too....Thanks, Wendy, for being such a positive force in my business!!

Michael

Up to this point, I thought that Google advertising and marketing was too expensive and too complex for my business. This DVD breaks the entire system and process down to simple, manageable steps for any size business and budget to engage in. I'm designing my campaign tonight and will have it live tomorrow. The production quality and content is excellent. Thanks Wendy!

Wendy is truly a genius, and has put together a program that is a no fail system
I am so blessed that I have had the chance to meet her in person and say thanks
for all she has helped

Thanks Again, Price aka Mr "O"

Ms. Stevens has provided a valuable service to those who want to market their products or services on the internet. We marketers are rapidly learning that any provider of products or services to a general market must market on the internet. Reports are that so far this holiday season, online sales are up 20%, while bricks and mortar vendors are reporting barely any incresase at all.
Ms. Stevens not only tells you how to reduce your advertising costs on this medium, she presents it in the DVD format, which most of us find easier to comprehend than written book material. This is particularly true when she demonstrates actual examples of how to impliment the secrets she teaches us.
Her history as a coach diagramming plays on a blackboard obviously taught her how to get her points across in an understandable way. I'm looking forward to her next foray into this field.

I have tried several internet marketing approaches, but Wendy Stevens' simple step-by-step approach has truly been what the doctor ordered!  Reading through tons of "how to" books have been quite confusing, but having a visual guide to walk you through the process is great!  My business has taken off to a new level thanks to what I've learned from Wendy!  Thanks a million!

Wendy Stevens went step by step through the process of building your own google campaign.  All screens and information were shown and easy to understand.  Definitely recommend if you want to save money.

Wendy does a masterful job at detailing what is needed to market your product online.  Every business needs a constant source of potential customers and this will certainly create new prospects and customers.

This is outstanding world class training from the top female internet marketer training today on up to the minute updates on Google. Reverse Google Marketing chunks down a scary, complicated monster in Google and provides simple step by step instructions to get great results on Google at a minimal cost. I used to try to outspend my competitors on Google Search to be on the top spot in a search listing for my business, super competitive, crazy expensive and never the results I knew other marketers were making happen on Google. Now I have a proven backdoor method created by Google themselves on their content network to target niche markets. Wendy Stevens has the amazing ability to lead and guide you through the process while keeping it simple.

I have been totally blown away with the content itself....worth TONS MORE than all the Google "training" I have spent hundreds of hours and thousands of dollars on without the results I was looking for. I have worked with many of well known trainers out there from Perry Marshal to Alex Mandossian. Wendy's delivery is masterful as a trainer who provides killer content and blows those guys away ! You go girl !
If your interested in lead generation and you are on a tight budget these DVD's will pay for themselves.

This is just the best thing since marshmallows! The key to a good s'more is the marshmallow...and this will complete your marketing strategy like a golden brown, toasty marshmallow completes the s'more! Delicious!

This step-by-step guide to Google marketing made all the difference!  Wendy's practical, no-nonsense guide serves both the newbie and the veteran Google marketer.
Thank you, Wendy!
Allen Higby

I found this product VERY helpful. It is complete and covers all aspects of google marketing. Has great content. I understand she is a top google marketer so she should know what she's doing. I think it will help you.

As an internet marketer I don't have time to research every type of advertising source and go through a long learning curve--this product offered a real solution to get me up and running with real results in no time--Wendy Stevens really knows how to get the message across in a clear concise way that everyone can understand--If you want to learn Google Marketing and you don't want to pay an arm and a leg for your trial and error education--this is the way to go---HIGHLY RECOMENDED

A clear concise user friendly way to get the very most from your marketing dollar. It should cost thousands more. If you can follow a recipe your one "click" away from taking your internet marketing to new heights.

I've struggled with advertising, used several tools to create campaigns but none as easy to use and as effective as this directive.  Impressive presentation and even more impressive results!  Thanks for helping me drive traffic to my site.

Wendy, thank you so much!  Reverse Google Marketing has made internet marketing so crystal clear to understand so that anyone can do it.  This has made such a difference in my network marketing business.  I can't thank you enough!  Bravo

love you Wendy

This product has simplified the process of putting together my google campaign, answering the questions in a clear step by step process that I found very helpful.

I would highly recommend this product.

I am just getting started with an internet business. This has catapulted my business. This shows you how to save money and put your business in front of literally millions of people. WOW! What a great business tool.

Mike

This DVD is concise and straight to the point. If you are a new marketer and want to succeed quickly, include this as an invaluable tool for your business. The information along with step by step instructions paves the way to exposure and ulitimate lead generation! Thank you for your wisdom.
Why is it that all of these reviews fall within a 4-day span ?  Smells a little fishy to me, but apologies if I am wrong.

Reverse Google Marketing is a must have for any internet marketer.  Wendy Stevens simplifies and cracks open a whole new world of internet marketing.  It is simplified enough that even a technologically challenged person like myself can do it!  Anyone marketing on the internet should invest in this product wihout hesitation.  It will transform their internet business literally overnight.  Thanks Wendy.
Step by Step plan of reverse google marketing.  It is so easy anyone can do it!  I'm even computer illiterate!  Has made a hugh difference in my marketing plan and success!  Thank you Wendy!

Great stuff!

We  were fortunate enough to  attend Wendy's seminar in Fort Lauderdale.  Wendy is a dynamic trainer and coach.  The DVD reflects her  knowledge and powerful presentation skills.  An absolute must have for the Internet Marketer.

Have been through a few "must have" tutorials on marketing...alot of great information. The magic here is in Wendy's natural ability to get you in the game, thinking like a marketing mogul...knowing exactly what to do, where, how and why...to actually build, manage & tailor your own, kick #@*# campaign A to Z...1,2,3.

Wendy, thanks so much for the training of Reverse Google Marketing 2008 in Fort Lauderdale.  When I got home, I plugged into the simple instructions and that was all there was to do! I now can say - I'm a Master Marketer

Cody Hammons  "Weekends are Everyday"

you need to listen what wendy has to say. this lady knows were she is going and she is a master at what she does.

Finally - help with reverse Google marketing!  This product clears the smoke and allows even a novice to market effectively.  Highly recommend.

I did not know the difference between search and content. Being technically challenged I could not understand the steps necessary to market on the internet. WOW...We just completed watching this DVD and it is a MUST HAVE for all Internet Marketers!  Wendy Stevens has done an exceptional job simplifying the complexity of internet marketing in this precise, step by step video presentation. Wendy Stevens simply and clearly walks you through each step of building a reverse google marketing campaign. Reverse Google Marketing is a tool  every serious internet marketer must have.

Wendy has shown the way for newbies to get over their fears about marketing. I haven't seen anything better. A must-have.

I have been having results with google for awhile, but after this wonderful addition to my library, I have seen quite a bit more. I was fortunate indeed to have been at a seminar two weeks ago in Ft Lauderdale, Florida which was hosted by Wendy Stevens, author of "Reverse Google Marketing. I have spent literally thousands of dollars in years past for books and tapes and the like from seminars by experts in their respective fields. Never have I experienced the energy of Wendy Stevens. She held over two hundred people in captivated awe at her knowledge of her subject and her uncanny ability in driving it into our minds. For two whole days, this woman never stopped walking back and forth on the stage spouting statistics, dates, ratios, etc, without consulting a single note.  She answered specific questions and responded to all manner of questions from the rapt audience. I am still digesting the material by watching the DVDs over and over again. If anyone follows her wealth of knowledge on internet marketing and doesn't succeed in their campaigns, they simply didn't do it her way.  Her systems are spelled out in minute detail and are all based on her fantastic success in her chosen career. You will be hearing from Wendy Stevens again. As far as I am concerned, she is the final authority on Internet Marketing.
Dwight Entwistle, Satellite Beach,Florida

I am in my 40's.  I didn't grow up with computers but had to "jump on the train" while it was pulling out of the station.  I can edit documents, send emails, open attachments and even fix a jammed printer.  But when I entered the field of internet marketing I didn't know that there was a whole university's worth of knowledge that I was missing!  But once I put in Wendy's DVD it was like plug and play. She did everything short of hold the mouse and guide the cursor for me! Oh wait - she did do that!  Even a child could get it in a heartbeat. - Step-by-step video presentation removed the content mystery for me and made internet marketing much more palpatable for me. I learned some basic and not so basic advertising concepts so that I could create more sharper target specific advertising.  Also, makes it possible for little guy to be seen. Highly recommend this dvd if you don't know what you're doing or think it's beyond you. You will get it. If not, just hit rewind and play it again...

It is usually a preconceived idea that marketing on the internet must be difficult, especially with an Internet powerhouse like Google. Perhaps the greatest testimonial is that I am able to apply what I learned and take my internet marketing to a new professional level that yields results almost instantly! First, it needs to be pointed out that ALL of these reviews were written by Wendy Stevens herself or "friends" of hers.  DO NOT believe all the "positive" remarks regarding this product.  Second, this product is now 100% outdated.  Wendy uses this garbage as a sales tool to get new associates to sign up to whatever business/scam she is trying to push.  It's REALLY impressive when she says "go to amazon and type in Reverse Google Marketing" and all of a sudden a product for $900 shows up and if you join her scam/business she'll send it to you for free.  To recap....#1.  This product is PURE garbage.  It's outdated and no longer of use.  #2.  These reviews were written by Wendy Stevens.  #3.  Wendy Stevens is garbage.  If she contacts you about a business/scam....I would run in the other direction.  Just a bad person to the core.
